definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: Which kind of resources are used in Biomass energy projects?
sentences.chinese: 生物质能项目中会用到哪些资源？

sentences.english: Hydroliquefaction of lignified biomass polysaccharide is studied at low temperature.
sentences.chinese: 研究了木化生物质聚糖的低温加氢液化。

sentences.english: It aims to generate 30 gigawatts of electricity from biomass by 2020.
sentences.chinese: 政府计划到2020年用生物质产生30吉瓦的电力。

sentences.english: Waste from Canada’s agricultural sector can provide for biomass-derived fuels.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大的农业废料可用作生物质燃料。

sentences.english: Method for calculating re-utilizing degree of the biomass energy is presented.
sentences.chinese: 文中还给出了计算系统生物质能再利用程度的方法。

sentences.english: Wet biomass can be efficiently gasified in supercritical water to produce a hydrogen rich fuel gas.
sentences.chinese: 湿生物质可以在超临界水中有效地气化生成富氢气体。

sentences.english: The results showed that the biogas fermentation potential of cotton stalk was less than other stalk materials.
sentences.chinese: 尽管如此，棉秆蕴藏着丰富的可开发的生物质潜能。

sentences.english: But the carbon balance for biomass crops depends on the whole lifecycle.
sentences.chinese: 但是，生物质农作物的碳平衡必需依赖整个生命循环。

sentences.english: Today, that biomass is fed to cattle, among other things.
sentences.chinese: 今天，生物质原料同其他食物一起用来养牛。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a biomass board by compression-moulding bamboo splints;
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及一种用竹条压制成型的生物质板材。

sentences.english: Compared to coal, biomass pellet machine power generation.
sentences.chinese: 相比燃煤发电，生物质颗粒机发电优势明显。

sentences.english: They need biomass for a number of reasons.
sentences.chinese: 他们出于许多原因而需要生物质。

sentences.english: Solvolysis is one of the important processes of biomass liquefaction.
sentences.chinese: 溶剂溶解技术是生物质液化的重要过程之一。

sentences.english: Gasifier is the core component in biomass gasification for power system.
sentences.chinese: 气化炉是生物质气化发电系统的核心设备。

sentences.english: Densifying biomass has been practiced in the US for the past 40 years.
sentences.chinese: 生物质密实一直实行美国在过去40年。

sentences.english: There is a brief introduction on industrialization of biomass energy technology in China.
sentences.chinese: 本文简要介绍了我国生物质能技术产业化研究。

definition: thermal cleavage (i.e. sth splits when heated)
